skill.name: domain-name-brainstormer
skill.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.
skill.summary: Generates creative domain name ideas and checks availability across multiple TLDs for your project.
skill.author: softaworks

security_audit.summary: Static scanner flagged 55 potential issues, all evaluated as false positives. The skill contains only documentation files (README.md, SKILL.md) with no executable code. Detected patterns are markdown code block syntax and benign documentation content misinterpreted by pattern matching.

content.value_statement: Finding the perfect domain name is time-consuming and frustrating. This skill automates brainstorming by generating creative, relevant domain options and checking availability across multiple TLDs.
actual_capabilities: Generates creative domain name ideas based on project description
Checks domain availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, etc.)
Provides branding insights explaining why certain names work
Suggests alternative variations when preferred names are taken
Provides pricing context for different domain types
limitations: Does not actually register or purchase domains
Does not verify trademark availability or legal conflicts
Does not check social media handle availability
Does not provide DNS configuration or hosting guidance

use_cases.title: Startup naming
use_cases.description: Generate creative, brandable domain names for a new startup or product launch, with availability checks across key TLDs.

use_cases.title: Personal brand domains
use_cases.description: Find available domains for personal branding, portfolios, or professional sites using your name or professional identity.

use_cases.title: Project and product naming
use_cases.description: Brainstorm domain names for side projects, apps, or digital products with relevant TLD recommendations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic brainstorming
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm building a [project type] for [target audience]. Suggest creative domain names.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have a general idea and need creative suggestions

prompt_templates.title: With TLD preference
prompt_templates.prompt: I need a domain name for my [product description]. Prefer [specific TLDs like .ai, .io, .dev] extensions.
prompt_templates.scenario: When you have specific TLD preferences

prompt_templates.title: With keywords
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest domain names using the words [keyword1] or [keyword2] for my [business type].
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want to include specific brand keywords

prompt_templates.title: Availability check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check availability for [specific name] and similar variations across [comma-separated TLDs].
prompt_templates.scenario: When you want to verify specific domain availability

output_examples.input: I'm building a tool for developers to share code snippets. Suggest creative domain names.
output: Top Pick: snippet.dev - Perfect for developer audience, short and memorable.

output_examples.input: I need a domain name for my AI writing assistant. Prefer short names with .ai extension.
output: Top Pick: writely.ai - Clear purpose, easy to spell, perfect for AI writing tool.

best_practices: Act fast when you find a good domain - quality names get taken quickly
Register variations across multiple TLDs to protect your brand
Choose names that are easy to say, spell, and remember
anti_patterns: Using hyphens or numbers that confuse verbal communication
Choosing names too similar to existing brands (trademark risk)
Waiting too long to register after finding a good name

faq.question: Does this skill actually register domains?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates suggestions and checks availability. You will need to use a domain registrar to complete the registration.

faq.question: What TLDs does it check?
faq.answer: It can suggest and check .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app, .co, .xyz, .design, .tech, and many others based on your needs.

faq.question: Can it check if a specific domain is taken?
faq.answer: Yes, you can ask it to check availability for specific domain names you have in mind.

faq.question: Does it verify trademarks?
faq.answer: No, it does not check trademark databases. You should independently verify no legal conflicts exist before registering.

faq.question: Can it suggest names in other languages?
faq.answer: Yes, it can brainstorm names in multiple languages based on your project description.

faq.question: Is this free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill itself is free. However, domain registrations typically require payment to the respective domain registrar.
